required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: BRAND'S® Essence of Chicken in the Promotion of Resilience and Resistance to Stress-associated Cognitive Inhibition
clinical_study.official_title: The Effectiveness of BRAND'S® Essence of Chicken in the Promotion of Resilience and Resistance to Stress-associated Cognitive Inhibition

lead_sponsor.agency: Taipei Medical University Shuang Ho Hospital

clinical_study.source: Taipei Medical University Shuang Ho Hospital

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether BRAND'S® Essence of Chicken are effective in the promotion of resilience and resistance to stress-associated cognitive inhibition.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a placebo-controlled, randomized, double-blind trial. There will be 100 subjects. Subjects are randomly assigned into either placebo or BRAND'S® Essence of Chicken (BEC), 70cc daily for 2 weeks, group.
Stress test, cognitive function assessment and blood tests will be carried out at Week 0, Week 2, and Week 4 (2 weeks after termination of supplementation).
The primary end-point is the better improvement of cognitive function after supplement with BEC than placebo. The second endpoints include improvement of global health survey and changes of biomarkers related to stress and immunity.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in cognitive function at week 2 and week 4

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in biomarkers and and immunity related to stress at week 2 and week 4
secondary_outcome.description: ACTH, Cortisol, Melatonin, Glucose, BUN/CRE, GOT/GPT

other_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in global health survey at week 2 and week 4

arm_group.description: placebo with the same color, order, taste as BRAND'S® Essence of Chicken , 70cc daily for 2weeks
BRAND'S® Chicken Essence 70cc, daily for 2 weeks

intervention.description: BRAND'S® Chicken Essence of 70cc daily for 2 weeks Placebo 70 cc daily for 2 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- aged over 20 years,
- mildly stressed with Perceive Stress Scale (PSS) score higher than 25
- All the participants should not require medication for their mood disturbance affected by stress during the trial.
Exclusion Criteria:
- history of chronic diseases
- any psychiatric or neurological diseases (e.g. depression)
- other medical illnesses (e.g. stroke, diabetes, other cardiovascular diseases)
- allergy history to chicken

overall_official.affiliation: Neurology, Shuang Ho Hospital, Taipei Meidcal University, New Taipei City, Taiwan

facility.name: Shuang Ho Hospital, Taipei medical University
